name: Peluzos
description: Peluzos pizza is a delightful combination of artisanal tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, prosciutto, and mushrooms. It's a flavorful choice that satisfies both meat and veggie lovers alike. The richness of prosciutto complements the earthiness of mushrooms, creating a pizza experience that's truly indulgent.

name: Tribeca
description: Tribeca pizza is a taste of Italy with artisanal tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, candied tomatoes, and ricotta cheese. The sweetness of candied tomatoes adds a unique twist to this classic combination. It's a sweet and savory delight that captures the essence of Italian cuisine.

name: Pesto
description: Pesto pizza is a green delight featuring a craft white sauce, mozzarella cheese, ricotta cheese, and, of course, pesto. The aromatic basil and nutty flavor of pesto create a refreshing and vibrant pizza. It's a perfect choice for those who enjoy the freshness of herbs in every bite.

name: Fugazzeta
description: Fugazzeta pizza is a savory experience with mozzarella cheese, white onion, parmesan, provolone cheese, and olives. The combination of cheeses and the savory notes of white onion make this pizza a savory delight. Fugazzeta is a classic choice for cheese lovers who enjoy a medley of flavors.

name: Peperoni
description: Peperoni pizza is a classic NY-style pizza featuring artisanal tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and pepperoni. It's the go-to option for anyone who loves the bold and spicy kick of pepperoni on a traditional New York-style crust. Simple, delicious, and a timeless favorite.

name: Capore
description: Capore pizza is a fresh and vibrant option with artisanal tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, cherry tomatoes, and basil. The burst of flavors from cherry tomatoes and the aromatic basil make this pizza a delightful choice. Capore is perfect for those who appreciate the brightness of fresh ingredients.

name: Calabresa
description: Calabresa pizza is a gourmet experience with artisanal tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, gourmet chorizo, onion, and olives. The savory chorizo and the combination of onion and olives create a rich and flavorful pizza. Calabresa is a top pick for those seeking a premium taste.

name: Zucchini
description: Zucchini pizza is a veggie lover's dream with artisanal tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, feta cheese, zucchini, and lemon. The combination of feta cheese and the freshness of zucchini and lemon create a light and tangy pizza. Zucchini pizza is an excellent choice for those who enjoy a veggie-centric and zesty flavor profile.
